name: Logo
description: Primary logo design based on brand strategy and creative direction.

name: Color Palette
description: Custom brand colors including primary, secondary, and neutrals.

name: 3D Mockups
description: Visuals of the logo applied to realistic environments and products.

name: Logo Formats
description: Exported in multiple formats: SVG, PNG, PDF, EPS.

name: Color Variations (Full Color, Solid Black, Solid White)
description: Three versions of the logo for flexibility across light and dark backgrounds.

name: Typography
description: Font selection and hierarchy for brand consistency.

name: Brand Guidelines
description: PDF document that explains logo use, spacing, colors, typography, and more.

name: Favicon Design
description: Tiny icon version of the logo optimized for browser tabs.

name: Social Media Kit
description: Profile icons, covers, and post templates for platforms like Instagram, Facebook, etc.

name: Business Card Design
description: Front and back design including logo, name, and contact details.

name: Letterhead Design
description: Professional letter template with branding elements.

name: Email Signature
description: Branded email footer with logo, contact info, and social links.

name: Mockup Presentation
description: A final PDF or slide deck showcasing logo in use across various applications.

name: Revisions (x2 rounds)
description: Two rounds of revisions included for client feedback and fine-tuning.

name: Export for Print (CMYK)
description: Print-ready exports with proper color profile and resolution.

name: Export for Web (RGB)
description: Web-optimized logo files with correct color profile and compression.

name: Monochrome Versions
description: One-color logo variations for simplified usage or printing constraints.

name: Responsive Logo Variants
description: Smaller/simplified versions of the logo for mobile and small screens.
